title: Hour 1 - Lakers Acquire Patrick Beverly, Bad News for Cowboys
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Lakers Acquire Patrick Beverly, Bad News for Cowboys
description:
Dan Patrick reacts to the Los Angeles Lakers acquiring Patrick Beverly. Dan breaks down why Vegas bettors are showing love for the Broncos and Eagles. Could Russell Westbrook be heading to the Pacers? Plus, the Dallas Cowboys and Oklahoma City Thunder get horrible news.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
